name: Michael G. LEVINE v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (NEWELL CORP. AND TRAVELERS INSURANCE CO.), Petition of Newell Corp. and Travelers Insurance Co.
name_abbreviation: Levine v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Michael G. LEVINE v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (NEWELL CORP. AND TRAVELERS INSURANCE CO.), Petition of Newell Corp. and Travelers Insurance Co.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of June, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and the case is remanded to the Workers’ Compensation Judge to consider whether Claimant’s claim petition was timely filed based on this Court’s decision in Schreffler v. WCAB (Koeher Coal Company), 567 Pa.527, 788 A.2d 968 (2002).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
798 A.2d 1273
Michael G. LEVINE v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (NEWELL CORP. AND TRAVELERS INSURANCE CO.), Petition of Newell Corp. and Travelers Insurance Co.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 10, 2002.
